column2: "Hello, my friend! Still showering your little ones with love?"
"Ahh, you don't need to say a word! I can feel the bountiful bundle of affection radiating from your body!"
"Even Hansel and Gretel can feel it! They're staring at you like they're longing for a petting!"
"Ah! Heeeey!"
"Yo! You really pulled through for Stratos! She's really something, isn't she?"
"She's too reliant on them. Seriously, new classes shouldn't be causing trouble for others."
"Ooh! Those are Pets, aren't they? This is my first time seeing them! They're amazing!"
"Hahahahah, don't get too excited, Claris Claes! This is the first time even I've ever seen these types!"
"Should our Battle Commander and their assistant really be so clueless about Summoners...?"
"Have you taken a liking to Hansel and Gretel? They're quite gentle and adore people! You may pet them to your heart's content!"
"I see, this one's called Hansel! He's so fluffy and squeezable!"
"I'd heard they were Photon-based life-forms, but I didn't expect anything like this...!"
"H-Hey. Aren't those Pets the ones that get really dangerous if you touch them too much?"
"Let's stop them."
"Let's run."
"Both of you! Stop!"
"You need more love! More love! These children are not satisfied!"
"Love must be given to them like this! With a firm, strong hand, using all your might!"
"Now, Hansel! Receive my love!"
"Uwarrgh!"
"It blew up that hard inside the ship?! This love stuff is pretty impressive!"
"...That guy's not dead, is he?"
"...Heh, hehahah! Ahahahahahaa! As passionate an expression of love as always, Hansel! It was so intense I fainted for a few seconds!"
"But I will bear the full force of your feelings!"
"Ahh, Gretel! You look so lonely! Do not fret, for I love all equally!"
"Ugrraaagh?!"
"I see, Summoners need to be pretty durable! What a deep and complex class!"
"They get what they deserve..."
